Synopsis: Retrieves information about a specific file batch in an OpenAI Vector Store.
Description: The Get-OAIVectorStoreFileBatch function retrieves information about a specific file batch in an OpenAI Vector Store. It requires the VectorStoreId and BatchId parameters to identify the file batch.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIVectorStoreFileBatch -VectorStoreId "store1" -BatchId "batch1"
Retrieves information about the file batch with ID "batch1" in the Vector Store with ID "store1".
